text: Kare-ra wa, buzoku rengo-gun wa haitai shita node wa nai to kangaete iru. Moshi buzoku rengo-gun ga (futatabi) kuru koto ga areba, kare-ra wa bedo~in-zoku no ma ni mi o oite, anata gata no josokuwotazuneru (tachiba ni naru) koto o negatte iru. Mata moshi kare-ra ga anata gata no naka ni ite mo, wazuka no mono no soto wa tatakawanaidearou
